p: The web-based software tool ALEA (FormsVision BV, Abcoude, The Netherlands) is used for randomization, clinical data collection, and central data management. Data management is coordinated by the Clinical Trial Center Rotterdam and data collection is performed by The Netherlands Comprehensive Cancer Organization (Integraal Kankercentrum Nederland). Data entry is done according to study specific data entry guidelines, promoting a uniform and standardized way of data entry and providing procedures for exceptions (i.e. missing values, unknowns). Data managers are trained in using the ALEA electronic case report form system prior to data entry start.
